title: Deathclaw Democracy
fractured_timeline_context: Deathclaws from FO1's intelligent talking deathclaws (Vault 13), FO3's feral ones, FO4's nest-protecting mothers, and FO76's cryptid variants all exist at once. One group is intelligent. The others are not. Conflict ensues.
premise: Goris (FO2 intelligent deathclaw companion) survives in this timeline. He's discovered that some FO1-era deathclaws retained intelligence while others devolved. He wants to restore intelligence to ALL deathclaws. Humanity is... not thrilled.

stages.name: A Claw Extended
stages.description: Goris contacts you through Harlan Voss (who remembers intelligent deathclaws from old NCR reports). Goris wants to create serum to restore intelligence to feral deathclaws.

objectives.text: Help gather FEV samples from Mariposa/Institute
Test serum on one feral deathclaw

stages.outcome: First feral deathclaw regains intelligence, can speak, remembers being intelligent centuries ago. Emotional moment.

stages.name: The Awakening
stages.description: You've restored intelligence to a pack of deathclaws. They remember their origins, their creators, their persecution. Now they want rights. They want a seat at the faction table.
deathclaw_demands: Give them territory (Quarry Junction becomes Deathclaw City)
Recognize them as sentient beings with rights
Access to medical care and education

human_reaction.legion: Want to enslave them as war beasts
human_reaction.minutemen: Willing to negotiate (Preston Garvey is surprisingly progressive)

stages.name: Claw and Order
stages.description: Tensions explode. Deathclaw  hunters won't stop. Intelligent deathclaws defend themselves. You must prevent species war or pick a side.

option1_deathclaw_rights.name: Fight for Deathclaw Rights
option1_deathclaw_rights.description: Help Goris create first Deathclaw Nation. Fight human factions who refuse to accept them.
option1_deathclaw_rights.consequence: Deathclaw City founded, but many humans die in conflict

option2_compromise.name: Broker Compromise
option2_compromise.description: Create DMZ where intelligent deathclaws live separately but peacefully.
option2_compromise.consequence: Uneasy peace, regular negotiation quests unlock

option3_reverse_serum.name: Reverse the Process
option3_reverse_serum.description: Destroy serum, return deathclaws to feral state. Goris begs you not to.
option3_reverse_serum.consequence: Intelligent deathclaws lost forever, Goris becomes enemy

option4_human_supremacy.name: Extermination
option4_human_supremacy.description: Help BoS hunt ALL deathclaws, intelligent or not.
option4_human_supremacy.consequence: Deathclaws extinct, huge dark karma loss, BoS loves you

ending_deathclaw_nation.name: The Scaled Republic
ending_deathclaw_nation.description: Intelligent deathclaws form their own nation. Quarry Junction becomes Deathclaw City with schools, government, culture.
ending_deathclaw_nation.gameplay: Deathclaw vendors, quests, companions. Some human factions perpetually hostile. New storylines about deathclaw-human integration.

ending_coexistence.name: Separate but Equal
ending_coexistence.description: Deathclaws and humans maintain separate territories with trade agreements.
ending_coexistence.gameplay: Deathclaw zone on map, diplomatic quests, trading post at border.

ending_tragic_loss.name: The Last Intelligent Deathclaw
ending_tragic_loss.description: You chose to reverse intelligence. Goris is last of his kind, bitter and alone.
ending_tragic_loss.gameplay: Goris becomes tragic wandering NPC, occasionally helps player but resents them.

ending_extinction.name: Silent Quarries
ending_extinction.description: All deathclaws exterminated. Wasteland is 'safer' but you genocided a sentient species.
ending_extinction.gameplay: No more deathclaws, massive karma loss, haunted by choice.

meta_note: FO2 had intelligent talking deathclaws. Most players never experienced them. This quest brings them back and asks: should ALL deathclaws be intelligent? Heavy moral weight.

goris_dialogue.if_player_helps: You have shown that humans and deathclaws can be allies. My people will remember this.
goris_dialogue.if_player_betrays: I thought you were different. I was wrong about humans. I was wrong about you.
goris_dialogue.on_success: For the first time in generations, deathclaws have a future that isn't just survival. Thank you.
goris_dialogue.on_extinction: You could have saved us. You chose not to. I hope you can live with that.

unique_items: Goris's Respect (legendary charm that makes deathclaws non-hostile)
rewards.potential_companion: Goris (intelligent deathclaw from FO2 joins permanently if you help him)
